Articles.Content: it comes from: http://imgur.com/a/Uuuge  for my trips and my other projects i been forgoting to show some love to my orbital station so i decided to send a few trips and in the last one, add a new and shinny thug,  make it a decent way to land my tugs  and give some repairs  at the end i lost almost all money  so i have to start to grind to take there the comand pod, the nuclear reactor, some food and another safety things like escape pods and everything !
looks cool!! what mods do you use?
